task.summary: 1. Change ApplicationID ( com.ethernom.alarmhelloworld => com.ethernom.alarmhelloworld.v3) in graddle 2. Add AlarmRecevier with flag isAlreadyCreateAlarm = true 3. In AlarmReceiver We add - AlarmWorkManager => in doWork we just logging - Rearm Alarm every 30 seconds 4 Add MyWorkManager with flag isAlreadyCreateWorkerThread = true 5 In doWork of MyWorkManager we do BleRecevier.startScanning 6 When user click notification after rang we change isAlreadyCreateWorkerThread = false to do step 4 & 5 again

1.Add Discover and Setting Screens 2.Add conditions to check manufacturer: - if host device Samsung stat enable alarm - else just scan only , 3. Change ApplicationID(com.ethernom.alarmhelloworl.v3 => com.ethernom.alarmhelloworld.v4) in gradle 4. Add AlarmRecevier with flag isAlreadyCreateAlarm = true 5. In AlarmReceiver We add - AlarmWorkManager => in doWork we just logging - Rearm Alarm every 30 seconds, 6. Add MyWorkManager with flag isAlreadyCreateWorkerThread = true , 7.In doWork of MyWorkManager we do BleRecevier.startScanning, 8.When user click notification after rang we change isAlreadyCreateWorkerThread = false to do step 5 & 6 again

In AlarmReceiver We add - AlarmWorkManager => in doWork we just logging - Rearm Alarm every 30 seconds, 7. Add MyWorkManager with flag isAlreadyCreateWorkerThread = true , 8.In doWork of MyWorkManager we do BleRecevier.startScanning, 9.When user click notification after rang we change isAlreadyCreateWorkerThread = false to do step 6 & 7 again

1.Hard code for private key to authentication card. 2.Add Discover and Setting Screens 3.Add conditions to check manufacturer: - if host device Samsung stat enable alarm - else just scan only , 4. Add AlarmRecevier with flag isAlreadyCreateAlarm = true 5. In AlarmReceiver We add - AlarmWorkManager => in doWork we just logging - Rearm Alarm every 30 seconds, 6. Add MyWorkManager with flag isAlreadyCreateWorkerThread = true , 7.In doWork of MyWorkManager we do BleRecevier.startScanning, 8.When user click notification after rang we change isAlreadyCreateWorkerThread = false to do step 5 & 6 again
